Package de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.datageneration.unit

A unit is a standardized weight or measurement that describes the generated entity more precisly.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ObservableUnit To be able to update the weight and measurements whenever a change in the data structure happens, we use Observer Pattern to get the desired effect.
ObservableUnitCustom To be able to update the weight and measurements whenever a change in the data structure happens, we use Observer Pattern to get the desired effect.
ObserverUnit To be able to update the weight and measurements whenever a change in the data structure happens, we use Observer Pattern to get the desired effect.
ObserverUnitCustom To be able to update the weight and measurements whenever a change in the data structure happens, we use Observer Pattern to get the desired effect.
WeightAndMeasurement The intention behind this interface is to model weights and measurement not fitting into one of the other units.
WeightAndMeasurementCustomized The intention behind this interface is to model weights and measurement not fitting into one of the other units.
 

Class Summary
Currency This is the unit of currency.
Custom Customized class to represent weight and measurements.
Length This is the unit of length.
Mass This is the unit of mass.
Math It's the unit of math.
Miscellaneous Here are the units gathered, which do not fit into any other category.
Temperature This is the unit of temperature.
Time A class to represent units in time.
Unit An unit is a standard of a weight or a measurement.
UnitFactory This is a factory for all different types (strategies) of weight & measurements.
 

Package de.uni.bamberg.wiai.minf.forflow.datagenerator.controller.datageneration.unit Description

A unit is a standardized weight or measurement that describes the generated entity more precisly. It's also possible to customize the unit with your own units entities.
